original_text: And this is the law of the Nazarite, when the days of his separation are fulfilled: he shall be brought unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation:
korean_text: 나실인의 법은 이러하니라 자기의 몸을 구별한 날이 차면 그 사람을 회막 문으로 데리고 갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: And this is the law of the Nazarite,
when the days of his separation are fulfilled:
he shall be brought unto the door
of the tabernacle of the congregation:
